overview:
Information Architect and Team Leader in a wide variety of Web applications. I like to develop quick utilities or procedures that are a new way to look at existing job responsibilities. Primarily interested in open source and Web Oriented Technologies and how Social Networking online makes the difference in the real world. High degree of curiosity in a variety of areas. I like to stay mentally alert and like mental challenges. I’ve a strong personal belief in life-long learning and look for deeper meaning in things. Willing to take risks to learn and do something new. Specialties

I enjoy learning and to be supportive of most training and development endeavors. Driven by competition and challenges, motivated to achieve and win in a variety of areas. Able to multi-task and keep important projects moving. Many interests outside the workplace. Like to manage CMS and Web Application Project. PHP / Drupal software development, architecture planning and training.
